# response_formatting

Response formatting interfaces for structuring LLM outputs.

This module provides a way to define structured output formats for LLM responses.
The `@response_format` decorator can be applied to classes to specify how LLM
outputs should be structured and parsed.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="response_formatting/index" symbolName="FromCallArgs" /> FromCallArgs

A marker class for indicating that a field is a call argument.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="response_formatting/index" symbolName="ResponseFormat" /> ResponseFormat

Class representing a structured output format for LLM responses.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="response_formatting/index" symbolName="response_format" /> response_format

The `ResponseFormat` class for defining how to structure an LLM response.
